title: Please fix 3v3 bot problem
body:
Jesus how are these bots getting away with getting to level 40
my last 5!!!! Games had bots

replies.body:
trilaning bot especially from blue side creates essentially an "extra" "short" lane and what gets real fucked is whn all 3 know how to rotate and uve got 1-3 kleptos +an ancient coin on towers at 5mins

-spelltheifs + demolisher should be avoided as the entire game can fail its no gaurantee and its no the jungler to know identify and pull out if u cant force returns with an extra shove/rotation into it

ppl are dumb its above this games iq. hon players werent. that simple. and as time goes forward these ppl get even dumber its quiet a sight so see. outside normal human behiavour. and ur a fool if u take extrapolatable inferences from this data/userbase, statistically ur application is a failure. not even close.
